avail.title: 4th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The
avail.author: Hickerson, Jay

infos.info: John Dunning refers to the series as 'a situation comedy' and states 'It was a landmark tv series with an audition episode produced for radio February 27, 1952, but never broadcast.' This one is dated February 26, 1952 and is obviously the show to which he refers, so either he erred on the date or the incorrect date is entered in the file. I think subscribers might want to have it because it is one of a kind and there is a mystery surrounding it.

prints.title: On the Air : The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio
prints.author: Dunning, John
